Swipe left, right, up, or down to slide the tiles across the grid. When exactly 2 tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
At the end of each move, 1 new tile is placed randomly on the grid. The game ends when you can no longer make a move. Can you create the 2048 tile?
Swipe left, right, up, or down to slide the tiles across the grid. When exactly 3 tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.

Swipe left, right, up, or down to slide the tiles across the grid. When either 2 or 4 tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
At the end of each move, 2 new tiles are placed randomly on the grid. The game ends when you can no longer make a move. Can you create the 16384 tile?
Swipe left, right, up, or down to slide the tiles across the grid. When exactly 2 tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
New tiles are placed randomly on the grid at fixed intervals, not after each move. The game ends when the grid becomes full and no more tiles can be placed. Can you create the 2048 tile?
Swipe left, right, up, or down to slide the tiles across the grid. When 2 consecutive Fibonacci numbers touch, they merge into one to form the next Fibonacci number in the sequence.
At the end of each move, 1 new tile is placed randomly on the grid. The game ends when you can no longer make a move.
